actions.text: Amendments en bloc (A033) offered by Mr. McKeon.
On agreeing to the McKeon amendments (A033) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendments en bloc comprised of amendments numbered 73, 146, 149, 150, 152, 153, 156, 157, 158, 161, 163, 166, 170, 171, and 172 printed in House Report 113-108. See page D576 of the Congressional Record of Friday, June 14, 2013, for en bloc amendment descriptions.
purpose: Amendments en bloc consisting of amendments printed in Part B of House Report 113-108 numbered 73, 146, 149, 150, 152, 153, 156, 157, 158, 161, 163, 166, 170, 171, and 172.
